short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See team member names in APDA pairings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "APDA Team Name Converter," a Chrome extension designed to inject a personalized touch into your online debating experience. Tired of the same old team names? Look no further!

This extension allows you to see individual member names for teams in posted pairings and outrounds on nu-tab.com. The extension automatically gets the names IF the team name list is public, and replaces the team names on posted pairings/outrounds with member names from the team list. You can see an example of this in the posted pictures.

Whether you're a seasoned debater looking to liven up the virtual stage or a casual observer seeking help, APDA Team Name Converter is the perfect extension to enhance your online debating experience. Download it now!
